DOC.brief_title: Manipulation , Exercise , Self-Care Low Back Pain
DOC.detailed_description: Low back pain remain important public health problem serious socioeconomic consequence . Despite considerable amount research preformed , still dire need randomize clinical tile high methodological quality . The broad , long-term objective interdisciplinary research identify effective therapy low back pain sufferer increase understanding important condition . Building upon principal investigator ' previous collaborative research , randomize observer-blinded clinical trial compare follow treatment patient nonacute low back pain : 1. chiropractic spinal manipulation 2. rehabilitative exercise 3. self care education Theprimary aim examine relative efficacy three intervention term patient rat outcomes short-term ( 12 week ) long-term ( 52 week ) nonacute low back pain . Secondary aim include : 1 . To examine short long-term relative cost effectiveness cost utility three treatment . 2 . To assess clinically important difference pre-specified subgroup low back pain patient . Subgroups base duration current episode radiate leg pain . 3 . To evaluate treatment group difference objective lumbar spine function ( range motion , strength endurance ) 12 week treatment change lumbar function associate change patient rat short long-term outcome . 4 . To identify baseline demographic clinical variable predict short long-term outcome . 5 . To describe patient ' interpretation perception outcome measure use clinical trial .
DOC.criteria: patient 1865 year age ; Qu√©bec task force classification 1,2,3 4 ( include patient back pain , stiffness tenderness , without musculoskeletal sign neurological sign ) ; primary complaint back pain , current episode great equal six week duration ( include subacute chronic patient study treatment option ) previous lumbar spine surgery ; back pain refer local joint lesion low extremity visceral disease ; progressive neurological deficit due nerve root spinal cord compression ; aortic peripheral vascular disease ; exist cardiac disease require medical treatment ; blood clotting disorder ; diffuse idiopathic hyperostosis ; infectious noninfectious inflammatory destructive tissue change lumbar spine ; presence significant infectious disease , severe debilitate health problem ; substance abuse ; ongoing treatment back pain health care provider ; pregnant nursing woman ; pain score less 30 percentage point ; pending current litigation
